author: Unknown
text:
A Knowledge Network member is wondering: 
With limited resources and time to track absenteeism, I’m very interested in knowing if anyone has recommendations for the types of absenteeism that should be most carefully tracked to best evaluate the health of an organization – scheduled absences (vacation, personal time off), unscheduled absences (sick days, disability, FMLA, Worker’s COMP) and partial shift absences (arriving to work late, leaving early, longer breaks).
If you have any advice for this member or relevant policies please post them below. 
Thank you, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org
title: Evaluating the Health of an Organization using Absenteeism
